sentences.english: He was anointed princeps ; the Roman empire is said to begin with his accession.

sentences.english: In theory, Whitehall officials and ministers back in London oversaw the empire.

sentences.english: Qin Shihuang had the Great Wall built to keep the enemy out of his empire.
